targets.query: SELECT last("value") * -1 + 100 FROM "[[DS]]"."cpu" WHERE "host" =~ /^$host$/ AND "mode" = 'idle' AND "cpu" = 'system' AND $timeFilter GROUP BY time([[ds_int]]) fill(null)
SELECT sum("value") FROM "[[DS]]"."ram" WHERE "host" =~ /^$host$/ AND "type" = 'used' AND $timeFilter GROUP BY time([[ds_int]]) fill(null)
SELECT sum("value") FROM "[[DS]]"."disk_space" WHERE "host" =~ /^$host$/ AND "type" = 'used' AND $timeFilter GROUP BY time([[ds_int]]) fill(null)

panels.description: Total storage used by the application. Does include replication / EC overhead.

targets.query: SELECT sum("value") FROM "[[DS]]"."disk_space" WHERE "host" =~ /^$host$/ AND "type" = 'used' AND $timeFilter GROUP BY time([[ds_int]]) fill(null)

panels.title: Used storage capacity

panels.description: Total storage usable by the applications. Doesn't take into account replication / EC overhead
panels.title: Total storage capacity

panels.description: Total amount of actual data stored in OpenIO.
panels.title: Stored data

panels.description: Total number of objects in storage. Objects uploaded using MPU (Multipart Upload) may result in multiple objects created in OpenIO.
panels.title: Objects (OpenIO)

panels.description: Total bandwidth as seen by the system.

targets.query: SELECT sum("value") FROM "[[DS]]"."net" WHERE "host" =~ /^$host$/ AND "type" = 'received' AND $timeFilter GROUP BY time([[ds_int]]) fill(null)

panels.title: Bandwidth (System)

panels.description: Total bandwidth as seen by the S3/Swift gateway
panels.title: Bandwidth (Gateway)

panels.description: Average response time of the S3 / Swift gateway
panels.title: Gateway Response time

panels.description: Total number of server (5xx) errors during the past hour
panels.title: Server errors (1h)

panels.description: Time to first byte of S3 GET requests

targets.query: SELECT sum("value") FROM "[[DS]]"."net" WHERE "host" =~ /^$host$/ AND "type" = 'received' AND $timeFilter GROUP BY time([[ds_int]]) fill(null)

panels.title: S3 TTFB (GET)

panels.description: Time to first byte of S3 PUT requests

targets.query: SELECT sum("value") FROM "[[DS]]"."net" WHERE "host" =~ /^$host$/ AND "type" = 'received' AND $timeFilter GROUP BY time([[ds_int]]) fill(null)

panels.title: S3 TTFB (PUT)

targets.query: SELECT sum("value") FROM "[[DS]]"."net" WHERE "host" =~ /^$host$/ AND "type" = 'received' AND $timeFilter GROUP BY time([[ds_int]]) fill(null)

panels.description: Number of 5xx errors during S3 roundtrip

targets.query: SELECT sum("value") FROM "[[DS]]"."net" WHERE "host" =~ /^$host$/ AND "type" = 'received' AND $timeFilter GROUP BY time([[ds_int]]) fill(null)

panels.title: S3 Roundtrip errors
